item.title: I'm thankful 🙏 and relieved 😊 the larges...
item.description: I'm thankful 🙏 and relieved 😊 the largest tax increase on Americans, which consumers and taxpayers would have had to bear, was ruled illegal. If higher taxes are wanted, Congress must act. We get the same old Trump whine about a “partisan court.” Not true! Supreme Court must uphold this ruling!

item.description: I'm so happy today is Friday 🎉 and the start of a long weekend! 🌞 September is going to be a busy month. 📅

item.description: The rain has stopped 🌧️ and the evening is going to be cooler 🌬️ and humid.

item.title: This weekend's been pretty much a washou...
item.description: This weekend's been pretty much a washout ☔️ from yesterday to today, and it looks like tomorrow's gonna be the same. But honestly, it's fine! 😊 I'm just using the time to catch up on things 📚, and we definitely needed the rain to cool things down a bit 🌧️.

item.title: After Friday’s good news from my cardiol...
item.description: After Friday’s good news from my cardiologist, I’m celebrating by cooking dinner for my parents and me: Chef Jean-Pierre’s pot roast recipe👨‍🍳🥩🥕🧅🥔. The house already smells amazing 😌🍽️ It’s in the oven and cooking 🔥⏲️. Photos may come later 📸.

item.title: Two wins this weekend 🎉: set up Webmenti...
item.description: Two wins this weekend 🎉: set up Webmentions and Bridgy Fed on my old Blogger site (now www.michaelponders.com) after a week of troubleshooting 🛠️, and updated my Micro.blog theme to Jim Mitchell’s excellent mnml ✨. https://www.michaelponders.com

item.title: Saw my cardiologist today 🩺 (visit 2 of ...
item.description: Saw my cardiologist today 🩺 (visit 2 of 3, monthly echocardiograms). EF is up: 51% in May → 74% in July → 77% today 📈. Gradient keeps improving. I feel better and mostly symptom-free 😊. Looks like Camzyos is working for me 💊❤️ #HCM #Camzyos #HeartHealth #Cardiology
